Vocalist/Producer

Electronic Press Kit

Biography

Music is therapy and Veronica Eileen knows it well. By tapping into personal experiences, this multifaceted Singer, Songwriter, Producer & instrumentalist consistently shares unique expressions through an immersive, versatile soundscape and takes an especially DIY approach to everything she creates. VE stays focused on carving out her own space in the electronic realm, blending elements of ambient, alt pop, and experimental bass with the common denominator being her signature, ethereal yet haunting vocals. The projectâ€™s main intention is to connect listeners with their roots and emotions, while promoting a safe space within the music community.

Since its inception in 2019, VE has opened for and played alongside electronic heavyweights G Jones, Elohim, Yoshi Flower, Ivy Lab, Of the Trees, Mr. Carmack, Crywolf, AU5 and Chime. Look out for her upcoming debut CHAOS EP, which will more formally introduce Veronica Eileen's distinct sound and artistic vision through a kaleidoscopic lens.
